title: Tab System
description: The Tab System project consists of interactive tabs. It allows you to organize content on a website. Implemented in HTML, JS, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Cookie Checker
description: The Cookie Popup project is a pop-up cookie consent window. It informs users about the use of cookies. Implemented in HTML, JS, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Textarea Character Counter
description: The Textarea project is an input field with a character counter. It limits text length in real time. Implemented in HTML, JS, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Accordion
description: The Accordion project is an interactive component. It allows you to hide content and display more information in a limited. Implemented in HTML, JS, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Dropdown Menu
description: Custom dropdown menu that lets users select an item from a list. When an item is selected, the dropdown closes, and the selected item is marked. Implemented in HTML, JS, Tailwind CSS.

title: Age Calculator
description: The Age Calculator project calculates age based on the input date of birth. It provides the result in years, months, and days. Implemented in ReactJS and Tailwind CSS.

title: Todo List
description: The Todo List project is a task management application. It allows users to add, delete, and mark tasks as completed. Implemented in ReactJS and Tailwind CSS.

title: Picture Gallery
description: The Picture Gallery project is a responsive image gallery. It displays images in a grid layout. Images getted from Unplash API. Implemented in ReactJS and Tailwind CSS.
